data.name: Mirror 2: Project X - Home - Lani's Costumes
data.detailed_description:
Please know that this is an optional DLC, it will not affect your total experience in the game. Please think twice before purchasing.

This DLC contains 25 sets of costumes for Lani that can be used in the Home section of Mirror 2: Project X.

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
